about_the_game:
Magic Mushroom Defense is a creative and challenging tower defense game. In the game, players must defend their castle from the invading magical mushroom army across 100 unique maze-like levels. Each level is meticulously designed, offering diverse challenges and rich strategic gameplay.

Players will utilize various powerful defense towers, strategically placing and upgrading them to defeat the incoming magical mushrooms. As the levels progress, the types and attack patterns of the magical mushrooms will evolve, testing players' strategic thinking and adaptability.
